lead_paragraph: A prosecutor said an investigation had revealed that a Pakistani man who was in Rome in March 2010 was “described as a kamikaze.”

headline.print_headline: Terrorist Cell Had Sights on Vatican, Italy Says
headline.main: Terrorist Cell May Have Sought to Attack the Vatican, Italian Officials Say

snippet: A prosecutor said an investigation had revealed that a Pakistani man who was in Rome in March 2010 was “described as a kamikaze.”
abstract: Italian authorities arrest nine people in investigation of Al Qaeda-linked terrorist cell based in Sardinia; say group once planned attack on Vatican but did not follow through with it; nine additional suspects remain at large.
